name: La Venganza Del Mosquito
description:
La Venganza Del Mosquito! (Revenge Of Mosquito)

Created by Scotty, Norgeous, Arijua.

Controls: WASD for movement. Left Shift to ascend, Left control to descend.  Space to bite and mouse to look around.

Play as a Mosquito seeking revenge against mankind! Make you way through the levels as you constantly lose blood. Seek your foe to regenerate blood before you die! 

This was our first ever game jam, please be nice! :) had a lot of fun and was a great learning experience.
